institution.value: Ouranos Consortium on Regional Climatology and Adaptation to Climate Change

title.value: ESPO-G6-R2 v1.0.0 : Derived Climate Indicators - Ouranos Ensemble of Bias-adjusted Simulations - Global models CMIP6 - RDRS v2.1

abstract.value: This dataset provides access to individual ensemble member ESPO-G6-R2 v1.0.0 (CMIP6) climate indicator data that form the basis of summarizes information on Ouranos' Climate Portraits website.

terms_of_use.value: In addition to the provided licence, the data used for the realization of climate scenarios are subject to the conditions of the source data. For more details, please refer to: https://pcmdi.llnl.gov/CMIP6/TermsOfUse/TermsOfUse6-2.html
